caption.p: Effect of MEBJ on mice. A) Open field test. B) Hole cross. C) Onset of sleep on thiopental sodium-induced sleeping time test. D) Duration of sleep on thiopental sodium-induced sleeping time test. E) EPM test (percentage of entry into open arms). F) EPM test (time spent in open arms). G) Hole board test (number of head dipping). All the values are expressed as mean ± S.E.M. where ap< 0.001, bp< 0.01 significantly different from control; ANOVA followed by Dunnett's test (n = 6) per group.
